name: smart-space-remover
title: Smart Space Remover
description: Intelligently process spaces in clipboard text: keep single space between English words, remove extra spaces | 智能处理剪贴板文本中的空格：保留英文单词间空格，删除多余空格，删除中文间的空格
author: SilentDeep

commands.name: smart-space-remover
commands.title: Smart Space Remover
commands.description: Remove extra spaces in clipboard text, keep single space between English words, remove extra spaces, remove spaces between Chinese words

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
